review_data.title: worst desert i have ever eaten, rude staff
review_data.content: The desert (matcha chocolate cake) was the driest cake that i have ever eaten. Accordingly, i told the staff that the cake is very dry. The staff replied, that this was their bestseller and did not remove it from the bill, even we complained and...More

review_data.title: Rather disappointing
review_data.content: A poor imitation of ramen. Generally tasteless and unremarkable. I lived in Japan and it was never like this. Corn and apple in ramen ?. A disappointing first and last experience.

review_data.title: Bad japanese restaurant, dont go if you have a minimun respect for food!
review_data.content: I love japanese restaurants and i wanted to try Midori, since it is very close to my place. The quality of the food is quite bad, specially in comparison to other japanish restaurants in Zurich, which have similar price. We had Edamame as a starter,...More

review_data.title: Nice ramen and staff…
review_data.content: Had a good meal here and would go again if I am back in Zurich. Had the kimchi and grilled leek with miso for appetizers—both had good flavor especially the leek. Then had a bowl of ramen—the broth is more “meaty” and on the thicker...More

review_data.title: Excellent vegetarian Ramen
review_data.content: Comfortable seating at small table, good Service. Baked Corn as starter Was a positive surprise We had excellent Tantamen, Miso soups

review_data.title: WORST Asian food I have ever tasted
review_data.content: STAY OUT - save yourself the money and disappointment. WORST Asian food I have ever tasted. review_data.title: Worst Japanese food I‘ve ever had
review_data.content: we went there for donburi but we were so dissapointed . there was nothing in it you could call umami or authentic japanese . the egg was served supercold & the topping on the rice was really poor, mostly cheap corn & poor in taste...More
